name: F/A-18 Super Hornet
description: A twin-engine, carrier-capable multirole fighter used by the U.S. Navy and Marine Corps. Known for versatility and reliability.

name: F-22 Raptor
description: A fifth-generation stealth air superiority fighter designed for the U.S. Air Force. Known for its speed, agility, and stealth.

name: F-16 Fighting Falcon
description: A highly maneuverable multirole fighter aircraft, widely used around the world. Known for its agility and versatility in combat.

name: F-14 Tomcat
description: A carrier-based supersonic fighter with variable-sweep wings. Famous for its role in the U.S. Navy and the movie Top Gun.

name: F-117 Nighthawk
description: The first operational stealth aircraft. Used for precision strikes and known for its faceted design to evade radar.

name: C-130 Hercules
description: A versatile military transport aircraft used for cargo, troop transport, and humanitarian missions. Known for rugged reliability.

name: C-17 Globemaster III
description: A large military transport aircraft capable of rapid strategic airlift of troops and cargo to main or forward bases.

name: B-2 Spirit
description: A stealth bomber capable of delivering conventional and nuclear payloads. Its flying wing design makes it nearly invisible to radar.

name: C-5 Galaxy
description: One of the largest military aircraft in the world, designed to transport oversized cargo across intercontinental distances.
